name: Goblin's Bounty: A Gamebook with Collectable Cards
blurb: Gamebooks meet collectable card games! Choose your path, gather powerful magic cards and cause havoc across time and space.

rewards.reward: THE GOLDEN GOBLIN AWARD. \r\nA Big Thank You for your support. \r\nWe will keep you notified with exclusive details on progress and you will get a download of large high quality digital poster of a gorgeous full colour illustration, which you can use as wallpaper or print it out. You will also get exclusive access to early BETA as early as December 2012 and the FULL GAME when it is ready!
THE GRAND GOBLIN AWARD. \r\nAll of the above and download of 3 additional large high quality digital poster illustrations so you can go wallpaper mad, or print them out.

THE GOBLIN GRAB BAG AWARD. 
All of the above and you will get 10 high quality digital illustrations as download.

You will also get a Goblin's Bounty live animated wallpaper for your Android tablet or phone with funky magic particle effects and layered moving planes of goblins, heroes and monsters. This live wallpaper won't be available on any app store, it is an exclusive item and will be sweet!

THE MUSICAL GOBLIN AWARD. \r\nAll of the above and you will also get the original Goblin's Bounty music album as high quality DRM free download, so you can tap your feet and shake some booty to fantasy harps and celtic flutes. The music will be produced by Emil - listen to the title song to get an idea on what to expect.

THE GARGANTUAN GOBLIN AWARD. \r\nAll of the above and your name will be in the credits as the founding supporter of Goblin's Bounty - a privilege any goblin would be proud of. We will also give you a secret magical code that will unlock a special card within the game... only available to shamans who know the magic word!
THE WANDERING GOBLIN AWARD. All of the above and a large high quality digital-download of the WORLD MAP illustration once it is completed.

THE GLORIOUS GOBLIN AWARD. \r\nAll of the above and we will name a minor character after you! It could be a demon, a rabbit or a tadpole, it is completely down to us, your name will be immortalised in a magical book.

THE GORGEOUS GOBLIN AWARD. \r\nAll of the above (minus THE GLORIOUS GOBLIN AWARD) and we will name an enemy after you! It could be a giant demon or an evil rabbit with glowing red eyes. You can work with us on creating this opponent and your name will be immortalised in a magical book. We will send you a full size drawing as well.

THE ARTISTIC GOBLIN AWARD.\r\nAll of the above minus, GLORIOUS, GORGEOUS and AWARDS. \r\nSend us your idea or sketch, and we will draw a large high quality digital drawing for you.. we reserve the right to refuse to draw something if we deem it unreasonable. (no naked drawings of the goddess for example).

THE BLISSFUL BOUNTY AWARD. \r\nAll of the above minus GLORIOUS, GORGEOUS and ARTISTIC AWARDS. Work with us to develop a new card! We will do our best to make your vision become reality - the card can be a spell, weapon or a potion and will need to fit the general theme, concept of Goblin's Bounty and function within the realms of what is possible within the existing rules (there is a possibility that the card can also come as an update to the game after go live). We can name the card after you, if you have a cool sounding wizardlike name, for example Baltar's Death Ray.. however Jim's Meteor Storm might be bit of a hard sell.

THE BENEFICIENT BOUNTY AWARD. 
All of the above apart from GLORIOUS, GORGEOUS, ARTISTIC and BLISSFUL AWARDS. 

We will arrange for you to go on a date with the Nature Goddess, Yeah!! ... ok, maybe not, but you will get to work with us on an alternative ending! We will do our best to make your idea become reality (this can include new card, enemy, location)- it will need to fit the general theme and concept of Goblin's Bounty and be within reasonable scale of about 10-20 sections (this ending will likely be an update to the game after it's release). You will get your name in the credits as someone who did the alternative ending.

THE GOBLIN AUTHOR AWARD
All of the above apart from BENEFICIENT, GLORIOUS, GORGEOUS, ARTISTIC and BLISSFUL AWARDS. 
This is the ULTIMATE award. You will get a huge thank you in addition to 2 weeks working with us to develop your own mini Android gamebook!
Allowance:
* 30 - 40 written sections of reasonable length - done by you.
* 1 frontpage illustration that we will draw for you according to your spec (within reason)
* 5 Illustrations that we will draw for you according to your spec (within reason) 
* 10 battles with different enemies.
* It will use the music from Goblin's Bounty
* Using existing cards from Goblin's Bounty and existing code framework  (i.e. no new code features or new mechanics)
* It must contain content that is suitable for 12 years and above.

Once development is completed, we will give you your Android game (directly - i.e. we will not be in charge of deploying to App Stores, etc), and you can do whatever you fancy with it - you can deploy it to Google Play or send it to your friends directly. It will have your own branding and will not be affiliated with Attic Squad.

All of this will have to be done within reason and completed within a 2 week period - so we won't be able to accomodate changes and revisions after this.

Please note that this is purely for fun, we reserve the right to decline an idea if we think it will damage the reputation of Attic Squad, and we will be unable to provide future support in any way once we give you the work.
